channel.title: CyberNetSec - Phishing
channel.description: Latest phishing threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: "Scripted Sparrow" BEC Group Targets Finance Teams with Highly Structured Attacks
item.description:
A disciplined and persistent Business Email Compromise (BEC) group, newly identified by Fortra as "Scripted Sparrow," has been systematically targeting corporate finance teams since at least June 2024. The group employs a structured and well-researched approach, sending highly credible phishing emai...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Phishing, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: "Operation ForumTroll" APT Targets Russian Academics with Plagiarism Lure
item.description:
The Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) group known as Operation ForumTroll has launched a new, highly targeted phishing campaign aimed at Russian political scientists and academics. Active since at least 2022, the group's latest attack uses meticulously crafted emails impersonating a major Russian sci...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Phishing, Cyberattack

item.title: New 'ConsentFix' Phishing Attack Hijacks Microsoft Accounts, Bypassing MFA via Azure CLI Abuse
item.description:
A novel and sophisticated phishing attack dubbed 'ConsentFix' allows attackers to hijack Microsoft accounts without stealing passwords or bypassing multi-factor authentication (MFA). Discovered by Push Security, the browser-native attack tricks users into completing a fake verification process that ...

Severity: High

Categories: Phishing, Cloud Security, Threat Actor

item.title: New Zealand Launches Massive Public Alert, Warning 26,000 Citizens of Lumma Stealer Malware Infections
item.description:
In a first-of-its-kind campaign, New Zealand's National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) is emailing approximately 26,000 people to warn them of potential infection by the Lumma Stealer malware. The potent information-stealing software targets Windows devices to covertly harvest sensitive data, includin...

Severity: High

Categories: Malware, Phishing, Data Breach

Read Full Article →

item.title: 'Operation MoneyMount-ISO' Phishing Campaign Deploys Phantom Stealer via Malicious ISOs
item.description:
A financially motivated, Russian-language phishing campaign dubbed 'Operation MoneyMount-ISO' is actively targeting finance and accounting departments to deploy the Phantom information-stealing malware. According to researchers at Seqrite Labs, the attack uses emails with fake payment confirmations ...

Severity: High

Categories: Phishing, Malware, Threat Actor

item.title: 700Credit Data Breach Exposes PII of 5.6 Million Individuals
item.description:
The U.S. fintech company 700Credit, a major provider of credit reports and data services to the automotive industry, has disclosed a data breach affecting at least 5.6 million individuals. The incident, which occurred in October 2025, resulted in an unauthorized actor gaining access to and stealing ...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Phishing, Regulatory

item.title: Hackers Use Animated Lures and Fake Legal Warnings to Spread Malware
item.description:
HP's latest Threat Insights Report reveals a significant evolution in social engineering tactics, with cybercriminals using highly convincing lures such as professional animations and fake legal warnings to trick users into downloading malware. The report highlights a campaign impersonating the Colo...

Severity: High

Categories: Phishing, Malware, Threat Intelligence

item.title: "Operation DupeHike" Espionage Campaign Targets Russian Corporate HR Depts
item.description:
A highly targeted cyber-espionage campaign, dubbed "Operation DupeHike," has been identified targeting employees in Russian corporations. Attributed to the threat actor cluster UNG0902, the campaign uses convincing social engineering lures, such as decoy documents about employee bonuses, to infiltra...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Phishing, Cyberattack

item.title: Fake Leonardo DiCaprio Movie Torrent Used as Bait to Spread Agent Tesla Trojan
item.description:
Cybercriminals are luring victims with a fake torrent for a new Leonardo DiCaprio movie to distribute the Agent Tesla information-stealing trojan. Security researchers at Bitdefender analyzed the campaign, revealing a complex, multi-stage attack chain that uses a malicious .lnk shortcut, hidden batc...

Severity: High

Categories: Malware, Phishing

item.title: Vishing Attackers Impersonate IT on Teams, Trick Users into Running Fileless Malware
item.description:
A sophisticated vishing (voice phishing) campaign is abusing trusted enterprise tools to deploy stealthy malware. Attackers impersonate IT support staff on Microsoft Teams, convincing users to initiate a Windows Quick Assist session. Once they have remote access, the attackers direct the user to a m...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Phishing, Malware, Security Operations
